review: Easy to use. I use my prime, netflix, youtube, and twitch. The picture is clear and it is quicker than using my playstation. I wish time warner on demand were on it though.
author: Paige

review: I now have this, apple tv, and Samsung smart tv. I rank this right up there with apple tv, though I do prefer the apple tv for how smooth it is.Mirroring is a tough one, but there is an app that allows you to mirror your phone. The phone remote is worth downloading, fyi. A very, very good buy for the price!

review: Wow, even better WiFi reception than I expected.

review: This exceeded our expectation, it works outstandingly, none of our streaming movies needed to buffer even though we do not have fast internet and have had this problem with our xbox and smart blue ray player particularly on our tv that  is far from our wifi router.  I also love the selection from prime!
author: Dave Lado

review: Once set up and plugged in, there's no way to shut it off. Energy wise, the AC adapter still uses electricity, unless it is unplugged from the power source.The movies and TV shows are great! No advertising, either!
